medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient reports that the pain began yesterday after eating spaghetti and meatballs. The pain is described as being in the right upper quadrant (RUQ), sharp, nonradiating, associated with nausea, non-bilious non-bloody emesis, and diarrhea. Denies fever. Reports experiencing similar pain about one week ago after a fatty meal, which prevented her from sleeping, but resolved eventually. No medical attention was sought for the previous episode.
medical_history.past_medical_history: End Stage Renal Disease (ESRD), Diabetes Mellitus Type 2 (DM2), Hypertension, Peripheral vascular disease, Cerebral aneurysm s/p coiling, Diabetes with neuropathy, Gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD), Left toe osteomyelitis treated with antibiotics.
medical_history.family_history: Mother died from lung cancer; father died from leukemia.
